classes.description: Parent wrapper class for the tablist.
Styles tablist without a bottom border.
Resizes the tablist to a smaller size.
Inverts the tablist to work on dark backgrounds.

accessible.description: A container for all tab role elements. (Source)
Use to the tablist element, this provides a common, readable title for what content the tab group provides.
Indicates an interactive element within a tablist. Elements with a tab role must either be a child of a tablist or have an id part of the aria-owns property of a tablist. (Source)
Use on the tab element, this communicates a connection between a tab and a tabpanel. (Source)
Use on the tab element, this is set to true when it is the selected element. It is set to false when it is not selected. (Source)
Use on the tab element, this provides a unique identifier that the tabpanel can reference with the aria-labelledby attribute.
Use on the container for content associated with a tab. (Source)
Use on the tabpanel element, this provides a unique identifier that the tab can reference with the aria-controls attribute.
Use on the tabpanel element, this communicates a connection between a tabpanel and a tab. (Source)
Use on the tabpanel element, use this to hide tabpanels that are not currently selected.
